title: New Deal attempt to revive the farm economy - how

content.question: The New Deal attempted to revive the farm economy during the 1930â€™s by

choices.label: reducing the amount of land under cultivation
opening up more federal land for homesteads

content.answer: reducing the amount of land under cultivation
